name: Mongo Transporter
description: Sync data between two MongoDB deployments.

SOURCE_MONGO_URL.description: The full connection string of the MongoDB deployment you want to sync from.

SOURCE_NS.description: The name of the database to sync from.

DESTINATION_MONGO_URL.description: The full connection string of the MongoDB deployment you want to sync to.

DEST_NS.description: The name of the database to sync to.
